TextEng: Get away, you. I'm just here for a drink, not to be harassed by your ilk.
Text: 저리 가. 난 한 잔 하러 왔지, 너 같은 부류한테 시달리러 온 게 아냐.

TextEng: I don't have time to talk to the likes of you, sorry. You could be one of them werewolves around here, for all I know.
Text: 미안한데 너 같은 사람이랑 이야기할 시간 없어. 이 근방에 들끓는 늑대인간 중 하나일지도 모르잖아.

TextEng: You strike me as one of those bandits you find on the road everywhere, nowadays. Hmph.
Text: 요즘 길마다 보이는 산적 같아 보이는데. 흥.

TextEng: It's a good thing the plague in Neverwinter is over. If it went on any longer, the city would be too weak and there'd be war for sure!
Text: 네버윈터의 울부짖는 죽음 역병이 끝나서 다행이야. 더 길어졌다면 도시가 완전히 약해져서 전쟁이 터졌을 거라고!

TextEng: You'd best be careful on the roads. We gots werewolves in these parts... and I hear there's monster bandits all over the northern routes.
Text: 길에서는 조심하는 게 좋아. 이 근방엔 늑대인간들이 있고... 북쪽 길목엔 괴물과 산적이 들끓는다더라.

TextEng: Pleased to meet you, <sir/madam>. Don't remember seeing you in Port Llast before now.
Text: 처음 뵙겠습니다, 선생님. 라스트 항구에서 본 적은 없는 것 같네요.

TextEng: I certainly hope you find the people responsible for the plague. What monster could do such a thing?!
Text: 그 역병의 책임자를 꼭 찾아내길 바래요. 어떻게 그런 짓을 할 수가 있죠, 대체 어떤 괴물이?!

TextEng: You're with Lady Aribeth, aren't you? Maybe you could do something about our werewolves while you're here.
Text: 아리베스 경과 함께 온 거 맞죠? 계신 김에 우리 동네 늑대인간 문제도 좀 해결해 주면 어때요.

TextEng: Are... are you that hero from Neverwinter that's here with Lady Aribeth? So wonderful to meet you!
Text: 저... 저 네버윈터의 영웅 분 맞죠? 아리베스 경과 함께 오신! 만나서 영광이에요!

TextEng: I don't suppose there's a chance you'd buy me a drink, handsome?
Text: 미남씨, 한잔 사줄 생각은... 없으신가요?

TextEng: (sigh) I knew there had to be big, strong men like you somewhere.
Text: (한숨) 어딘가엔 당신 같은 크고 힘센 남자들이 있을 줄 알았다니까.

TextEng: My, my. Hello there, handsome.
Text: 어머나. 안녕, 미남씨.

TextEng: If I knew this tavern had women like you about, I'd travel this way more often.
Text: 여기 당신 같은 아가씨들이 있는 줄 알았으면 이 길로 더 자주 다녔을 텐데.

TextEng: My, my... didn't expect to see any fine-looking lasses like yourself in Port Llast...
Text: 어머... 라스트 항구에서 당신 같은 아리따운 아가씨를 볼 줄은 몰랐는데...

TextEng: Greetings, lass. You're a fine-lookin' woman, aren't you? Care for a drink?
Text: 반가워요, 아가씨. 참 곱게 생겼네. 한잔할래요?

TextEng: We don't see much <race> folk like you in Port Llast. Mostly humans, here, you see.
Text: 라스트 항구에선 당신 같은 <race>족은 드뭅니다. 여긴 대부분 인간이라서요.

TextEng: You know, I heard you <race> folk are what caused that plague.
Text: 있지, 그 역병을 일으킨 게 너희 <race>족이라는 얘길 들었어.

TextEng: More <race> folk, is it? What, did you all decide to up and leave Neverwinter, now?
Text: 또 <race>족이야? 너희, 이참에 네버윈터를 죄다 떠나기로 한 거야, 뭐야?

TextEng: Err... we don't get many barbarians coming through Port Llast, usually...
Text: 어... 라스트 항구엔 보통 야만전사들이 잘 안 오는데...

TextEng: You barbarians do know how to behave in a tavern, right?
Text: 야만전사들도 선술집에서 예의는 아는 거겠지?

TextEng: What's that smell? It's like... bear dung, or something...
Text: 이 냄새 뭐지? 마치... 곰 똥 같은데...

TextEng: Please put that away, <sir/madam>. It makes me nervous.
Text: 그거 집어넣어 주세요, 선생님. 불안해지네요.

TextEng: Isn't there a policy in the taverns against walking around with a weapon out?
Text: 이 선술집에선 무기 뽑아 들고 돌아다니면 안 된다는 규정이 있지 않나요?

TextEng: I really wish you wouldn't wave that thing about in here.
Text: 여기서 그걸 휘두르지 않았으면 좋겠어요.

TextEng: Where did you get all those wounds?
Text: 그 많은 상처는 어디서 난 거죠?

TextEng: That's quite the lot of cuts you've got there. Must have been quite a fight.
Text: 베인 자국이 무척 많네요. 큰 싸움을 치르셨나 봐요.

TextEng: Those wounds of yours don't look good. Shouldn't you get them treated?
Text: 상처 상태가 안 좋아 보여요. 치료받아야 하는 거 아닌가요?

TextEng: Are you mad, running about without proper clothing?
Text: 옷도 제대로 안 입고 뛰어다니다니, 제정신이에요?

TextEng: What's this? Another half-naked refugee from Neverwinter?
Text: 이게 뭐야? 네버윈터에서 온 반쯤 헐벗은 난민이 또 있어?

TextEng: Err... you always run around taverns without your clothes, do you?
Text: 어... 선술집에서 늘 옷도 안 입고 돌아다니나요, 당신?
